abstract: New York Yankees are set to meet with Alex Rodriguez, who was suspended from baseball for the entire 2014 season because of using performance-enhancing drugs.
lead_paragraph: Rodriguez, who is coming off a 162-game suspension, is scheduled to meet with Yankees General Manager Brian Cashman and perhaps other front-office officials before spring training.

headline.main: Yankees to Meet With Alex Rodriguez

snippet: Rodriguez, who is coming off a 162-game suspension, is scheduled to meet with Yankees General Manager Brian Cashman and perhaps other front-office officials before spring training.
